message:
Does anyone know of any way to download dmg file for MacOS from Windows?
My macOS is gone and I need to create a bootable USB to reinstall it but can't find a single working link to download the dmg file

data.message: You can hard reset the lab and download it using your Mac machine
I've gone through this before and I was able to do so using virtual machine with macOs then downloaded the os from AppStore then UNIBEAST to make bootable flash drive.

hi mohamed, i could get it in torrent so you just need to have torrent client and download that file and download through torrent which has the dmg
problem is it is lion os, wish also it is healthy file
https://d2.usercdn.com/d/xelunwzotv2fvxijtt7yxdcvbq5w7x4jcdq3k5vnxgfgt4olh2mx7m2o/mac-osx-10.7-Lion-Mr-Technic.torrent
did you try Start up from macOS Recovery https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT201314

i had the same issue before
try rebooting into recovery mode, connect your device to internet and download MacOs
the alternative you send your device for TradeLine stores or any apple authorised retailer to install one for you
don't try to download dmg, they need to be made for your device
